name: PresidentLeeTalks
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: president lee talks
des: Select talks from Harold B. Lee, 11th President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Talks include 'Understanding Who We Are Brings Self-Respect', 'October 1973 General Priesthood Address', 'October 1973 Closing Remarks', 'Strengthen the Stakes of Zion', 'Follow the Leadership of the Church', 'Stand Ye in Holy Places', 'May the Kingdom of God Go Forth', 'Teach the Gospel of Salvation', 'Admonitions for the Priesthood of God' and 'A Blessing for the Saints'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
